posts.post_title: T202 Walter Johnson PSA 1 & Johnson, Cobb, Matty T206s
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Josh Adams

I have the following T202 and T206s for sale.  See scans for details.  First to email and say "I'll take it" gets the card.  Prices include shipping:



T202 Walter Johnson/ J. Knight "Knight Catches a Runner" PSA 1- SOLD



T206 Walter Johnson Hands at Chest PSA 1- $325



T206 Christy Mathewson White Cap PSA 1- $280



T206 Ty Cobb Red Port (Polar Bear back) SGC 20- $625



T206 Ty Cobb Batt Off Shoulder (Sweet Cap) PSA 1- $465
